Name: Corpus of Academic Slovene KAS 2.0
Description: This corpus contains BA, MA, and PhD theses in humanities, social sciences, and natural sciences published between 2000 and 2018. The corpus data are in the TEI format. The corpus is available for download from CLARIN.SI. Version 1.0 is also available for online querying through noSketch Engine and KonText (CLARIN.SI distribution).
Annotation: marked for bilingual and monolingual term candidates
